Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

addChildStyles(child : IUIElementStyle, name : String, type : StyleBlockType, ?exclude : StyleBlock) : Int

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.UIElementStyle
Method is called by children of the target to find their style. Finding a child's style is done in 3 iterations per style-type. First it looks in the parents 'idStyle', then in the 'styleNameStyle' and finally in the 'elementStyle'. When a child has the following style-selectors, the amount of searches will be: - idStyle => parent.findChildStyle (6 times) - 2 style-names => parent.findChildStyle (12 times) - elementName => parent.findChildStyle (6 times)

addStyle(style : StyleBlock) : Int

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.UIElementStyle

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.UIElementStyle

removeStyle(style : StyleBlock) : Int

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.UIElementStyle

removeStyleCell(styleCell : primevc.core.collections.FastDoubleCell_primevc_gui_styling_StyleBlock, ?isStyleStillInList : Bool) : Int

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.UIElementStyle
parameters
isStyleStillInList flag indicating if the style is still in the styles list. This is not the case when the styles are resetted since the whole list is thrown away.
Method will remove the given stylecell from the the list with styles. This includes removing the change-listeners. It will return a flag with style-properties that are changed after removing the style.

updateStyles(?allowBroadcast : Bool) : Int

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.UIElementStyle
Method will fill the styles-list for this object and enable the style-change listeners.
